caption.title: Retraction dynamics and expansion of the distribution area of Ceratophrys aurita according to the niche modeling method.
caption.p: Last interglacial (A); Last glacial maximum (B) and Current (C). (A): 12,163 km2; (B): 34,958 km2 and (C): 11,301 km2. Training data: AUC = 0.985 (A); AUC = 0.986 (B) and AUC = 0.988 (C). Test data: AUC = 0.985 (A); AUC = 0.973 (B) and AUC = 0.986.
Click here for additional data file.
